Body:
cmd = "%s -i %s %s -d '|' -o %s -c 0" % (os.path.join(script_dir,
    'gristle_freaker'), self.empty_fqfn, self.empty_fqfn, self.out_fqfn)
runner = subprocess.Popen(cmd, stdin=subprocess.PIPE, stdout=subprocess.
    PIPE, close_fds=True, shell=True)
_ = runner.communicate()[0]
assert os.strerror(runner.returncode).lower() in ['no data available',
    'no message available on stream']
out_recs = []
for rec in fileinput.input(self.out_fqfn):
    out_recs.append(rec)
fileinput.close()
assert not out_recs
runner.stdin.close()
